text: Great airport nice and clean, plenty of food and shopping. Alot of different area for you walk around and sit and relaxed

It is a clean and well-organized airport. However, I hope that the very inconveniences in purchasing duty-free goods and going through aviation security screening can be improved.

One of the best airports that I have visited, such a beautiful atmosphere around the whole airport. Thousands of people are coming to visit Singapore and immigration process is not too difficult. It was an amazing feeling to be here.

It's Big, really big. Makes Tullamarine look small regionalairport. Lovely and clean with helpful staff.  A destination within itself.  You could easily loose 4 hours looking around and dining at some of the attractions.

Easy to get around,  Err when you know where you're going.

T4 is by bus.
